Tarte Maracuja Oil (2019 formulation)

Brand: tarte

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Passiflora edulis seed oil, tocopherol.

Directions: This precious face oil can be used across skin types as part of your daily skincare and makeup routine. Apply 2-3 drops onto clean, dry skin on face and neck. You can also mix it with your moisturizer to help form an antioxidant barrier against the environment and seal in moisture longer. Mix 1-2 drops with your favorite liquid

dry skin on face and neck. You can also mix it with your moisturizer to help form an antioxidant barrier against the environment and seal in moisture longer. Mix 1-2 drops with your favorite liquid foundation for enhanced hydration and a dewy, radiant finish.

Warnings: : FOR EXTERNAL USE ONLY.

Ingredient concerns: LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity, Use Restrictions
